meta.description: Optimize the logistics network of a futuristic city to maximize the transport of goods from the central distribution hub (Node 0) to the primary delivery station (Node 7) without exceeding route capacities.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Transportation capacities between nodes in thousands of units

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of goods between nodes in thousands of units

objective.name: max_goods_transport
objective.description: Maximize the transport of goods from Node 0 to Node 7

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Node 0 to Node 1 does not exceed capacity
